entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
